mapper.select:
SELECT o.order_id, o.u_id, m.username, o.order_status, o.total_price, o.pickup_method, o.order_time, o.store_name, o.total_quantity,
-- 일일 주문 번호 ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY DATE(o.order_time) ORDER BY o.order_time ASC) as daily_order_num,
-- 상세 아이템 및 옵션 정보 od.order_detail_id, od.menu_id, m_menu.menu_name, od.amount AS item_amount,
-- 옵션 컬럼들 od.temp, od.tumbler, od.shot, od.vanilla_syrup, od.whipped_cream
FROM orders o -- 상세 내역 조인 LEFT JOIN order_detail od ON o.order_id = od.order_id -- 메뉴 이름 조인 LEFT JOIN menu m_menu ON od.menu_id = m_menu.menu_id -- ⭐ [핵심 수정] orders의 u_id와 member의 id를 조인 LEFT JOIN member m ON o.u_id = m.id
WHERE o.store_name = #{storeName} AND o.order_status = '주문접수'
ORDER BY o.order_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders ( u_id, order_status, total_price, pickup_method, order_time, total_quantity, store_name ) VALUES ( #{uId}, #{orderStatus}, #{totalPrice}, #{orderType}, #{orderTime}, #{totalQuantity}, #{storeName} )

INSERT INTO order_detail ( order_id, menu_id, amount, temp, tumbler, shot, vanilla_syrup, whipped_cream ) VALUES
( #{item.orderId}, #{item.menuId}, #{item.quantity}, #{item.temp}, #{item.tumbler}, #{item.shot}, #{item.vanillaSyrup}, #{item.whippedCream} )
